title: Mammoth Mammoth - Volume III: Hell&rsquo;s Likely (2012)ak6103
description:
Mammoth Mammoth (often stylized as MAMMOTH MAMMOTH) is an Australian hard rock/stoner rock band, formed in 2007 in Melbourne,consisting of vocalist Mikey Tucker, guitarist Ben Couzens (Cuz), bassist Pete Bell, and drummer Frank Trobbiani (Bones).

They independently released their self-titled debut EP in June 2008 through their label, Golden Triangle, followed by the full-length album Volume II: Mammoth in August 2009.

In November 2012, their third album Volume III: HellÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Likely was released, and after good sales in Europe they were approached and signed by the Austrian label Napalm Records.

Mammoth MammothÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s sound has been likened to Ã¢â‚¬Å“Motorhead doing mushrooms with Black Sabbath at a Butt Hole Surfers concert.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½

The band is well known for its raucous live shows, with Heavy Magazine Australia noting that Ã¢â‚¬Å“their live reputation precedes themÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ and that lead singer Ã¢â‚¬Å“Mikey Tucker knows no boundaries and goes in hard every time; throwing himself off the stage and throughout the crowd.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½

Mammoth Mammoth was banned from performing at two music venues in Melbourne. At the Tote, Tucker head-butted a glass window to get the attention of punters smoking outside, falling through it. He then continued the show covered in blood.
Sounds like they should be one of the best ever.
